function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus survival on various surfaces and at low temperatures","Impact":"High risk of surface contamination and prolonged survival of the virus","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces and implementing proper hygiene practices","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, UV-C light sanitation","People":"Health and non-health workers, general public","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, facility management"},{"Description":"Modes of virus transmission including direct and indirect contact, respiratory droplets, and fecal-oral route","Impact":"Increased risk of human-to-human transmission and potential for multiple transmission routes","Mitigation":"Wearing protective equipment, hand hygiene, respiratory etiquette, and sanitation of shared spaces","Technologies":"Masks, gloves, hand sanitizers, air purifiers","People":"Health workers, general public, facility staff","Owner":"Health organizations, employers, facility management"},{"Description":"Clinical features and high-risk groups for COVID-19","Impact":"Identification of symptoms and vulnerable populations for targeted intervention","Mitigation":"Early diagnosis, isolation of symptomatic individuals, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Diagnostic tests, vaccine development","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health authorities"}]}
